name: Dark Souls: Limited Edition
summary:
A spiritual successor to Demons Souls, the action RPG Dark Souls is set in a rich, dark fantasy universe. Intense action within the dungeon encounters with terrifying enemies and innovative online features combine for a unique gaming experience. Dark Souls' world breaks down barriers with a fluid design that encourages exploration and promotes an adaptation experience. At a time when the players come face to face with terrifying enemies and find new areas, the infallible system and reward challenge takes possession of everything to offer a sense of achievement without equal.

This limited edition was a free upgrade for pre-orders at participating retailers. It includes:
- Dark Souls
- 30-page hardcover art book
- Original soundtrack-Behind-the-scenes making-of videos
- Mini strategy guide

In North America, the edition comes in a metal tin, but the strategy guide, making of videos, and soundtrack are provided as a digital download. A token to redeem them is on a card in the set. In Europe, these items are on physical discs, but the metal case is omitted.
